EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
DNC 09.
VESSEL, WHITE HULL, 50 PERSONS ON BOARD,
REQUESTING ASSISTANCE IN 36-20.00N 017-06.00E
AT 300800Z OCT. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC ROME, INMARSAT: 424744220,
PHONE: 390 6592 4145, 3906 5908 4409,
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
